ERROR_MESSAGE: Something went wrong with your login request.
ERROR_USERNAME_TOO_LONG: Your username must be less than 1k characters!
ERROR_RATE_LIMITED_MINUTES: You have exceeded our rate limits. Please try again in a few minutes or reach out to support.
ERROR_RATE_LIMITED_DAILY: You have exceeded our daily rate limits. Please try again in 24 hours or reach out to support.
ERROR_RATE_LIMITED: You have exceeded our rate limits. Please try again later or reach out to support.
ERROR_TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS: Too many login attempts in the past hour. Please wait and try again.
ERROR_CAPTCHA_WRONG: You did not answer the security question correctly. Please go back and try again.
ERROR_EMAIL_TOO_LONG: Your email must be less than 1k characters!
ERROR_INVALID_EMAIL: That is not a valid email!
ERROR_USERNAME_TAKEN: That username is already taken by a different email. Try a different username.
